author: Mohsen Minaei
comment: Edit 3: I just realized that there has been changes in Android, so I had to install the face through the watch. After doing that, the face is working fine.  Edit 2: Even after the latest update, it still doesn't appear among watch faces.  Edit 1: I purchased LG V30 about a month ago. I had LG G6 before that and the watch face was working fine. But on V30 it doesn't show up in Android Wear. Please fix   Original review: It is a great face, but needs improvements. I have two suggestions. First, make UTC time changeable so that user can select a second location for it other than UTC.  Second, the analog clock that shows UTC time, it's better to find something else for it. Right now it seems that the author didn't know what to put there, so he/she just put a clock there which is redundant. Other than that, it is fantastic.

author: Nigel Blackman
comment: Seems useful watch face

author: Manifest Gamer
comment: I bought it I have a moto 360 and it's no were to be found
Purchased and does not show on Moto 360 or Android wear, junk, want $$ back

author: Travis Simerly
comment: Really love the features, but once I set everything to provide all that fantastic data the watch chews through battery. Lost 10% on freshly charged phone (no use-just setting there) and 62% of drain on phone was from watch face. Will be great when battery technology improves. But can't take the drain right now. Ahead of its time.
title: Love the Watch Face But Eats Battery

author: Steve McKee
comment: Using a ZForce phone, the watch face will not auto update the time when changing time zones. Phone does.
title: My 2 cents

author: joshua hites
comment: Worth purchase.

author: Donald Odom
comment: Love this watch face. Only issue is it is causing a "location found" notification to always stay on my phone. Fix please !

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
Could you send a screen shot to us?
I'd like to improve.
Please feel free to contact our email address.
Thank you.

title: Location

author: Mike
comment: The watch face displays in a small frame and very distorted
title: Does not work with the new Nixon watch

author: Megaenus Davis
comment: It works great with my moto Z
title: Get screen and app

author: Andrei Marinescu
comment: A bit cluttered, but nice watchface overall

author: Brian Griffin
comment: Moto360 1st. Gen. - love it BUT:  It needs to be more customizable: screen colours, "on screen" time could be less, reduce some components to increase battery time (ie lighted rim).  REALLY eats up battery time.  Recently completely dropped wind speed, direction and barometer* and I haven't been able to resolve it.  This is important to me as a cyclist.  *UPDATE 8/11/16:  I still love the app.  Rebooting BOTH watch and phone solved the above issue but now am having problems with the altitude reading...
title: Great with issues

author: Matthew Schmitt
comment: This watch face works great on moto 360 v2! Looks awesome, accurate, and surprisingly low battery consumption. I like to change things up often, but I always end up going back to this face within minutes, it's that good! Is my go-to!
title: Great face!!

author: Westley Ramey
comment: Uses low power and tweaking the screen settings I can make the battery last 3 days. Everything you need for all branches.
title: Great for military

author: Tony Gregg
comment: I bought and it shows installed but I don't have app on phone and no face on watch.  I have Android wear on phone and a moto 360.  Waste of money without a product
title: Installed but no access

author: Pablo Pura
comment: It has lots of nice info pretty much all you need, and it looks AMAZING.
title: Really nice

author: Anthony bronzene
comment: Very high tech looking, works well.
title: V08

author: Chad G
comment: Just like another face by dev doesn't work. Emailed several times with no fix. Emails sent dev says they are checking on the issue. Never had answers or a fix for the issue. Leaves you hanging. TAKES YOUR MONEY AND NEVER FIXES ISSUES. BUYER BEWAEE

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback again.
Could you please send us your environment.
I'd like to check and improve the face app.
Thank you.

title: Junk

author: Aaron Warner
comment: It's a pretty cool app. But how do I enable it to access GPS? How do I pull up the settings. Can't with the watch itself, and I can't find the app in the list of apps in my phone. It would be far better if I could access the settings.

author: Maurice Bruce
comment: After installing the update, my Samsung Note 5 started communicating with the app. Works great now. Thanks!

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
I've updated the app.Would you please check the latest version?
For additional question,please feel free to contact our email address.
Thank you.

title: Update address the issues surrounding Elevation  and weather

author: Brandon Coe
comment: Really nice watch face but I can't seem to find the app for it on my Nexus 6. Would appreciate help if possible.
title: Great Watch face

author: Daniel Wong
comment: Lots of useful information in well designed format.  Would like to see "number of steps" added.
title: Cool watch face!!!

author: Darrell Roberts
comment: As a pilot I'm using this face  to test altimeter accuracy as well as my Airspeed in knots.
title: Great Face

author: Redon Hoxha
comment: The watch face looks awsome in the picture but it just does not work right my moto 360.First it does not respond well to the watch sensor.in have to shake and turn a few times for the screen to come up.Second the display updates once in an hour for attitude and speed.Ambient screen looks terrible and not interactive at all.Not worth the money

reply.content:
Thank you for your helpful feedback.
Could you send us the screenshot of that? We'd like to improve.
Please feel free to contact our email address.
We can give you a help.
Thank you.

title: Good idea poor execution

author: Don Henry
comment: Another great Moto 360 watch face. I prefer the dark ambient mode. I don't like the green glow on the interactive mode.
title: 👍

author: R.K.
comment: This watch face has a ton of information, it has a good layout, looks good, and is the watch face to show your friends what a SmartWatch can do. The only downside is those of us of the older generations need a magnifying glass to see some of the information. Regardless I'd recommend this watch face for it's sheer fun value.
title: This is the impress your friends WOW watch face

author: Joe P
comment: I like it. But on a Huawei it will show up tiny and off center so I can't use it. It's already paid for, I hope to see it designed for my watch soon. Update: I'm now using the version for Huawei, and it works great! Awesome customer service.

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
We have a for-HUAWEI version and we can give you a help.Please feel free to contact our email address.
Thank you.

title: This version, Not for Huawei

author: Jack Laney
comment: It's good but could be better. Needs to be customizable, for instance you need to be able to even slightly modify the color scheme and change the units of weather etc.
title: Good

author: Russian Bot
comment: This actually looks good on the 360 2015's ambient mode! UPDATE: I finally got around to playing around with the Settings, and wow! The level of ambient mode control is indispensable on the 2015 360.
title: Wow!

comment: Doesn't work right on my moto 360 2nd gen

title: Bunk

author: Percy Reese
comment: Theirs no better app for my moto 360. Sticking with this one.

author: Austin Hider
comment: It has all the information I would need at a glance! Would like to change colors but that's not a deal breaker
title: Awesome

author: Bryan Burris
comment: Would get 5 stars if you could customize it more like making the background black.

author: Manik Chopra
comment: Great looking face, tons of information in one face. One option i'm looking for is to be able to change colors otherwise 5 stars.

comment: It's a good app
title: Love it

author: Stephen Harris
comment: Great
title: Great

author: Phillip Gonzalez
comment: I'm just a kid in a grown ups body that loves tech and trinkets. This is by far the coolest, futuristic looking watch face and I love it!
title: Awesome

author: Jarvis Williams
comment: I'm like a kid inside the candy store with these watch faces. This one looks like the cream of the crop and I love it. 5 stars.
title: In the aviation profession.

author: Gregory Harness
comment: Only watch faces I've seen that display this amount of information. Only wish there were more color options.
title: Awesome
